A wizened devil's cut off finger.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.lovers_watch.t: Clockwatch with the hands that indicate the Seconds missing.
Though left alone in the maddening abyss, the watch continued to tick, undisturbed
item.ironbounds_artefacts.magicians_mono: "Now, peer into the unseen, and experience the truths of the cosmos"
item.ironbounds_artefacts.judgement_scal: Pure golden scale, having witnessed countless trials.
"Weigh your heart, be the judge of only yourself"
Amulet often worn by an Old Hermit.
"The Ancient One That Watches Peers Through The Hermetic Amulet..."
The Crown of a Long Decayed Lich, feels horrible just looking at it.
Allows the creation of Greater Undeads
Allows the creation of Greater Undeads.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.insight_insign: In the days of long past, those who graduated from the Academy of the Arcane were granted this Insignia to showcase their accomplishments.

Some even claimed the Insignia enhanced the intuition and insight of their holders but these claims were dismissed as mere superstition. House Stellarkan has long since passed down of the Insignia once held by the Headmaster himself, as a sign of leadership.
The Insignia has become synonymous with Magical Authority.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.phylactery.too: When you are about to die, consume a certain number of souls to go to your spawn location.
You can set your spawn location in any dimension, at any position.
Be careful about where you set your respawn point.
Right Click to bind your spawn location.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.amulet_of_hold: Can be imbued with four spells.
As a drawback however, it will decrease the potency of all spells.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.archmage_spell: Spellbook dropped by the apprentice of an Archmage.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.forsaken_dream: The bloodied eye of those who dared to dream
item.ironbounds_artefacts.wizard_wand.to: Arcane Wands have long since been a sign of Wizards everywhere. Originally invented by one of the Archmages, House Stellarkan were amongst the first to enter Wand Manufacturing Industry and their innovation of the Hither Tither Wand produced this masterwork item.

Arcane Wands of Wizardry remain the staple choice of Wizards everywhere and new variants are being researched. Some say House Stellarkan is said to have an Arcane Wand gifted to the Headmaster by the Arbiter itself.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.wish.guide:
You express a wish to an extra planar being.
Different items will have different effects.
Wishing with a scroll will cause you to cast the spell inscribed on it with a level bonus equal to the level of wish.
Additional effects may be discovered.
The item in your main hand has got priority, and your offhand will only be used if your main hand is empty.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.time_stop.gui: You continually freeze the creatures that surround you for the duration of the spell. Frozen creatures are unable to move and cast spells and attack.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.kereshka_favo: You gain the blessing of the God of Elementals. The blessing's element corresponds to the first School Focus that you have in your inventory. Having a focus in your offhand will always take priority.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.arcane_batter: You can cast the next spell for free without any cooldown.
